Package net.sf.michaelo.tomcat.realm.asn1

Class OtherNameAsn1Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.michaelo.tomcat.realm.asn1.OtherNameAsn1Parser
  • public class OtherNameAsn1Parser
extends Object
    A minimalist ASN.1 parser for X.509 SAN:otherName according to RFC 5280, section 4.2.1.6.

    It properly takes JDK-6776681 into account and solves JDK-8277976.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static OtherNameParseResult parse​(byte[] otherName)
      Parses the DER-encoded ASN.1 SAN:otherName field into its components: type-id and value.
      static String parseUtf8String​(byte[] string)
      Parses a DER-encoded ASN.1 UTF8String to a Java string:

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public static OtherNameParseResult parse​(byte[] otherName)
                                  throws CertificateParsingException
        Parses the DER-encoded ASN.1 SAN:otherName field into its components: type-id and value.
        Parameters:
        otherName - a DER-encoded byte array
        Returns:
        the parse result
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if null is passed as otherName
        CertificateParsingException - if the DER-encoded byte array does not comply with ASN.1 DER encoding rules

        Returns:
        the converted Java string
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if null is passed as string
        CertificateParsingException - if the DER-encoded byte array does not comply with ASN.1 defininiton
